title: Council Decision of 22 April 2013 on the appointment of the member of the European Statistical Advisory Committee representing the Council
header:
4.5.2013 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 127/1
COUNCIL DECISION
of 22 April 2013
on the appointment of the member of the European Statistical Advisory Committee representing the Council
2013/C 127/01
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union,
Having regard to Decision No 234/2008/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 2008 establishing the European Statistical Advisory Committee (1),
Having regard to the Recommendation of the Economic and Financial Committee of 25 March 2013,
Whereas:
(1) Ms Maria Lucilia SALEMA E CARVALHO has resigned from the European Statistical Advisory Committee as a directly appointed member representing the Council.
(2) In the light of the resignation, the Council has decided to appoint Mr Maurizio VICHI as the member representing the Council in the European Statistical Advisory Committee,
main_body: Mr Maurizio VICHI is hereby appointed as the member representing the Council in the European Statistical Advisory Committee.
This Decision shall enter into force on 1 April 2013.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 22 April 2013.
For the Council
The President
E. GILMORE
(1)  OJ L 73, 15.3.2008, p. 13.
